question.xref: DES s8, DES s10, HC r170
question.text: You want to turn left at this junction. The view of the main road is restricted. What should you do?

explanation.text: You should slow right down, and stop if necessary, at any junction where the view is restricted. Edge forward until you can see properly. Only then can you decide if it is safe to go.

answer.text: Stay well back and wait to see if something comes
Build up your speed so that you can emerge quickly
Stop and apply the handbrake even if the road is clear
Approach slowly and edge out until you can see more clearly
